name: Averagoids
description:
Its a physics based asteroids game its kinda fun but definitely not a final product. It was made solely to help me learn unity and I do not plan to go anywhere with it.

It is built for 64 bit windows and has not been tested on anything else so it may or may not work.

Controls:

A & D to rotate

Space to boost

Hold J to shoot

Controller might work though it wasn't thoroughly test:

Left/Right On thumbstick to rotate

B to boost

Right trigger to shoot

ONLY TESTED ON XBOX 1 CONTROLLER
